short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clip selected web content to your DEVONthink database. Press Shift-Control-C to activate from the keyboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this extension to quickly clip selected web content to your DEVONthink database directly from Chrome. You need to have DEVONthink from DEVONtechnologies installed to make use of this extension.
